aka: A Drop of Clear Salty Liquid
trans_title: A Drop of Clear Salty Liquid
introduction: Being different or not being able to understand happen for whatever reason. A girl and a man shed tears for no reason, and nobody understands why they are crying. Should there be a reason for shedding tears in the first place? An experimental and beautiful film with various images of water and interviews with people on the screen, where black and white colors overlap. (MO Eun-young)
